title: Riot I have 23 hextech loot keys
body: As a OTP you know the deal i play exclusively play ONE champion 99% of the time at least i try too. Seriously though i have too many keys! this is very frustrating for OTP's Riot please change something about this that would make rewards more obtainable for one trick ponies.

replies.body:
I mean, no? They are already giving you purchase content for free. Maybe try to find more champions that you could enjoy playing. The problem with OTPs is they become useless if forced off their main pick which is actually detrimental to the competitive integrity of ranked. 

Lets look at a scenario here. OTP X plays only Shaco and is a challenger player. Shaco gets banned, he/she has never played any other champion in a competitive scenario and gets completely dumpstered because they don't have the skill on other champions to match their rank. That ruins the game not only for him/her but the four other players on the team. So I would recommend branching out and becoming as skilled on other champions as you are on your main.
Sucks for you as **_an_** OTP. Maybe, oh not do that?
Same here, OTP Zilean, 19 key shards and 2 epic skins for ahri and jinx which i haven't decided what to do with.
